queryMap.query: SELECT /* rsy4090_s01 */ T.MEET_CD ,T.STND_YEAR ,T.TMS ,T.DAY_ORD ,T.RACE_NO ,POST_DT ,CURR_DT ,REST_MM ,RACE_END_YN ,T.RACE_DAY ,'0' AS SVR1 ,'0' AS SVR2 ,'0' AS SVR3 ,'0' AS SVR_OK FROM TBES_SDL_TM T WHERE T.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND T.RACE_DAY = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY RACE_NO DESC
